content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

The unit of genetic organization in all living organisms is the chromosome.
content.question: How does the function and structure of the chromosome differ in prokaryotes?

frqParts.text: How does the function and structure of the chromosome differ in prokaryotes?
